# @watilde/hello-scoped-package 

test to use scoped package of npm

## Installation

Download node at [nodejs.org](http://nodejs.org) and install it, if you haven't already.

```sh
npm install @watilde/hello-scoped-package --save
```


## Tests

```sh
npm install
npm test
```

## Dependencies

None

## Dev Dependencies


None
